pasta.repository

Class PlayerDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.repository.PlayerDAO

  • public class PlayerDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object for Players.

    This class is responsible for all of the interaction between the data layer (disk in this case) and the system for players.

    Since:
    2014-05-01
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

    • Method Detail

      • getPlayerHistory

        public java.util.Collection<PlayerHistory> getPlayerHistory(java.lang.String username,
                                                   java.lang.String competitionName)
        Get the history (statistics) of all players a user has submitted to a specific competition from cache
        Parameters:
        username - name of the user
        competitionName - the short name (no whitespace) of the competition
        Returns:
        collection of the player histories (statistics)

      • getPlayerHistory

        public PlayerHistory getPlayerHistory(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String competitionName,
                             java.lang.String playerName)
        Get the history (statistics) of a specific player a user has submitted to a specific competition from cache
        Parameters:
        username - name of the user
        competitionName - the short name (no whitespace) of the competition
        playerName - the name of the player being queried
        Returns:
        the player history (statistics)

      • loadPlayerHistory

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PlayerHistory> loadPlayerHistory(java.lang.String username,
                                                              java.lang.String competitionName)
        Get the history (statistics) of all players a user has submitted to a specific competition from disk.

        Performs multiple calls to loadPlayerHistory(String, String, String).

        Parameters:
        username - name of the user
        competitionName - the short name (no whitespace) of the competition
        Returns:
        map of the player histories (statistics) with the key being the player name

      • loadPlayerHistory

        private PlayerHistory loadPlayerHistory(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String competitionName,
                              java.lang.String playerName)
        Get the history (statistics) of a specific player a user has submitted to a specific competition from disk.

        Calls loadPlayerFromDirectory(String) to aggregate the history of all players with the same name

        Parameters:
        username - name of the user
        competitionName - the short name (no whitespace) of the competition
        playerName - the name of the player being queried
        Returns:
        the player histories (statistics)

      • loadPlayerFromDirectory

        private PlayerResult loadPlayerFromDirectory(java.lang.String directory)
        Load the results of a single player from a directory.
        Parameters:
        directory - location of the player
        Returns:
        the player result (statistic).
